TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SecurityPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)
System.Obsolete("CAS support is not available with Silverlight applications.")

summary.span: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 执行安全操作。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 声明是允许的范围取决于的使用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 声明的安全特性的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中的存储，以及在运行时访问系统。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 对于命令性安全，使用相应的权限类。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class. 当你使用类中，按照与所请求的权限的安全操作。When you use the class, follow the security action with the permission(s) that are being requested. 可以请求，如中所定义的每个安全权限枚举中具有相应属性类。Each security permission that can be requested, as defined in the enumeration, has a corresponding property in the class. 例如，需要访问非托管的代码的能力，语句后执行按需正在请求，按如下所示的属性设置： `SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, UnmanagedCode=true)`。For example, to demand the ability to access unmanaged code, follow the demand statement with the property setting that is being requested, as follows: `SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, UnmanagedCode=true)`. > [!NOTE] > 等效的异常枚举并属性是枚举值由属性 (继承自类)。An exception to the equivalence between the enumeration and the properties is that the enumeration value is represented by the property (inherited from the class). 若要要求所有安全权限，请指定`Unrestricted=true`。To demand all security permissions, specify `Unrestricted=true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限允许被统一的.NET Framework 程序集，以及找到.NET Framework 外部的其他程序集重定向。This permission allows redirection of .NET Framework assemblies that have been unified, as well as other assemblies found outside the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

span.span: Creates and returns a new .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅应由安全系统中，永远不会由应用程序代码调用。This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code. 在编译时，属性将安全声明转换为元数据中的序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 此方法返回与此特性相对应的权限从创建元数据中的声明性安全数据。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

member this.Execution : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否声明了执行代码的权限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to execute code is declared.

value.span: 如果声明了执行代码的权限，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if permission to execute code is declared; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索要忽略程序集级别的权限。A demand for permission at the assembly level is ignored. 如果程序集具有的权限执行，请权限会被自动授予，并设置属性设置为任一`true`或`false`不起作用。If an assembly has the right to execute, permission is automatically granted, and setting the property to either `true` or `false` has no effect.

span.span: One or more of the values combined using a bitwise OR.

exception.span: 尝试将此属性设置为无效值。

span.span: An attempt is made to set this property to an invalid value.
See for the valid values.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示代码是否可以插入公共语言运行时结构，例如添加远程处理上下文接收器 (Remoting Context Sink)、Envoy 接收器 (Envoy Sink) 和动态接收器 (Dynamic Sink)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code can plug into the common language runtime infrastructure, such as adding Remoting Context Sinks, Envoy Sinks and Dynamic Sinks.

value.span: 如果代码可以插入公共语言运行时结构，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if code can plug into the common language runtime infrastructure; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 这是一个功能强大的权限，应仅授予高度受信任的代码。This is a powerful permission that should be granted only to highly trusted code.
